entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
